messages.subject: Christian alternative to Harry Potter
messages.msgSnippet: I m passing this along because Harry Potter seems such a polarizing topic within some homeschooling communities (even one of Holly s best homeschooling friends
messages.messageBody:
I'm passing this along because Harry Potter seems such a polarizing topic
within some homeschooling communities (even one of Holly's best homeschooling
friends is from an anti-Potter home), I thought you'd like to know some news,
perhaps even ahead of your Potter-fearful associates.


From: cwd@... (Bright Media Foundation & CWD)

Here is a great offer for you from Bright Media Foundation -

brought to you by ChurchWorldDirect.com

+ + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + +

A lonely orphan is caught up in an epic battle of good and

evil in the legendary land of Withershins. Come with

Jotham on a journey of suspense, intrigue and faith, as he

and his friends, Alfric and Gwyneth, battle dark forces

far beyond their understanding in a quest to fulfill their

deepest hearts' desires. It's a gripping fantasy infused

with ageless values of grace, hope, forgiveness...and love!


Why settle for merely "living the magic" when you can have

the love of the King?



In this allegorical tale, authors Bill Bright and

M.R. Wells take you to another place and time ... a world

in conflict where evil forces wield dark powers, and a

snow-white dove carries the indescribable and mysterious

truth of Prince Morning Star.


Like the works of J.R.R. Tolkien and C.S. Lewis, the novels

in "The Legend of Withershins" series are destined to

become Christian classics. A Child of the King is the

first book in this series, and it's available now at your

favorite Christian bookstore!


To get your copy right away, visit:

http://www.achildoftheking.org


"Filled with heartwarming characters, this story of love

and adoption will touch your heart and speak toook

http://www.achildoftheking.org



A Child of the King is a wonderful illustration of the

truths explained in greater detail by Bill Bright in

Living Supernaturally in Christ. Check it out when you

order your copy online!


+ + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + +
